question: I had my one hour glucola test about a week and a half ago failed it... tried to do a 3 hour test about 2 days later failed within the first hour... did another one today and made it all the way through went and took a bath tonight and when I got out my feet were hot and ichy and still are felt like I have fire ants all over them but there is nothing??? Any ideas I have read it could be diabetes but I'm hoping to get my mind off that
title: diabetes???
